alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 8:46AM EST until December 21 at 1:45PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Delaware and Chenango Counties. Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Broome and Susquehanna Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New York... Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Broome and Tioga Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River at Conklin. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flood stage. Alta, River and Lawrence Roads closed in the Town of Conklin due to minor flooding. No homes are flooded at this river stage. Valley park in Kirkwood takes on water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 7.5 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM EST.
